pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū isigilipasse tiṇakuṭiyo karitvā vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.3: Āyasmāpi dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto tiṇakuṭikaṃ karitvā vassaṃ upagacchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.4: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena tiṇakuṭiyo bhinditvā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca paṭisāmetvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.5: Āyasmā pana dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto tattheva vassaṃ vasi, tattha hemantaṃ, tattha gimhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.6: Atha kho āyasmato dhaniyassa kumbhakāraputtassa gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa tiṇahāriyo kaṭṭhahāriyo tiṇakuṭikaṃ bhinditvā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca ādāya agamaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.7: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca saṅkaḍḍhitvā tiṇakuṭikaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.8: Dutiyampi kho āyasmato dhaniyassa kumbhakāraputtassa gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa tiṇahāriyo kaṭṭhahāriyo tiṇakuṭikaṃ bhinditvā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca ādāya agamaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.9: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca saṅkaḍḍhitvā tiṇakuṭikaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.10: Tatiyampi kho āyasmato dhaniyassa kumbhakāraputtassa gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa tiṇahāriyo kaṭṭhahāriyo tiṇakuṭikaṃ bhinditvā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca ādāya agamaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.11: Atha kho āyasmato dhaniyassa kumbhakāraputtassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.12: “yāvatatiyakaṃ kho me gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa tiṇahāriyo kaṭṭhahāriyo tiṇakuṭikaṃ bhinditvā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca ādāya agamaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.13: Ahaṃ kho pana susikkhito anavayo sake ācariyake kumbhakārakamme pariyodātasippo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.14: Yannūnāhaṃ sāmaṃ cikkhallaṃ madditvā sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.15: Atha kho āyasmā dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto sāmaṃ cikkhallaṃ madditvā sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ karitvā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca gomayañca saṅkaḍḍhitvā taṃ kuṭikaṃ paci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.16: Sā ahosi kuṭikā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā lohitikā, seyyathāpi indagopako.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.1.17: Seyyathāpi nāma kiṅkaṇikasaddo; evamevaṃ tassā kuṭikāya saddo ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasa taṃ kuṭikaṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ lohitikaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.3: “kiṃ etaṃ, bhikkhave, abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ lohitikaṃ, seyyathāpi indagopako”ti?

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.7: Kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.8: Na hi nāma, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā anukampā avihesā bhavissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.10: Mā pacchimā janatā pāṇesu pātabyataṃ āpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.11: Na ca, bhikkhave, sabbamattikāmayā kuṭikā kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.13: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti, kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā yena sā kuṭikā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ kuṭikaṃ bhindiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.2.14: Atha kho āyasmā dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto te bhikkhū etadavoca—

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.3.7: “yāvatatiyakaṃ kho me, āvuso, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa tiṇahāriyo kaṭṭhahāriyo tiṇakuṭikaṃ bhinditvā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca ādāya agamaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.3.8: Yāpi mayā sabbamattikāmayā kuṭikā katā sāpi bhagavatā bhedāpitā.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.3.13: Sace tāni dārūni rājā dāpeti harāpetha, bhante”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.3.16: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.3.19: Atha kho dārugahe gaṇako āyasmantaṃ dhaniyaṃ kumbhakāraputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.3.21: Atha kho āyasmā dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto tāni dārūni khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chedāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā dārukuṭikaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.1: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto rājagahe kammante anusaññāyamāno yena dārugahe gaṇako tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā dārugahe gaṇakaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.3: devagahadārūni nagarapaṭisaṅkhārikāni āpadatthāya nikkhittāni kahaṃ tāni dārūnī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.4: “Tāni, sāmi, dārūni devena ayyassa dhaniyassa kumbhakāraputtassa dinnānī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.5: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto anattamano ahosi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.6: “kathañhi nāma devo devagahadārūni nagarapaṭisaṅkhārikāni āpadatthāya nikkhittāni dhaniyassa kumbhakāraputtassa dassatī”ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.8: “saccaṃ kira devena devagahadārūni nagarapaṭisaṅkhārikāni āpadatthāya nikkhittāni dhaniyassa kumbhakāraputtassa dinnānī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.12: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto dārugahe gaṇakaṃ bandhaṃ āṇāpesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.4.13: Addasa kho āyasmā dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto dārugahe gaṇakaṃ bandhaṃ niyyamānaṃ.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:1.6.7: Apagatā ime sāmaññā, apagatā ime brahmaññā.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.3: “imaṃ, bhante, okāsaṃ yo imesaṃ dvinnaṃ dārakānaṃ saddho hoti pasanno tassa ācikkheyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.4: Tena kho pana samayena tassa gahapatino bhāgineyyo saddho hoti pasanno. Atha kho āyasmā ajjuko taṃ okāsaṃ tassa dārakassa ācikkhi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.5: So tena sāpateyyena kuṭumbañca saṇṭhapesi dānañca paṭṭhapesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.6: Atha kho tassa gahapatino putto āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.7: “ko nu kho, bhante ānanda, pituno dāyajjo— putto vā bhāgineyyo vā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.9: “Ayaṃ, bhante, ayyo ajjuko amhākaṃ sāpateyyaṃ amhākaṃ methunakassa ācikkhī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.11: Atha kho āyasmā ajjuko āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.13: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upāli āyasmato ajjukassa pakkho hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.14: Atha kho āyasmā upāli āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.15: “yo nu kho, āvuso ānanda, sāmikena ‘imaṃ okāsaṃ itthannāmassa ācikkheyyāsī’ti vutto tassa ācikkhati, kiṃ so āpajjatī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.46.17: “Ayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmā ajjuko sāmikena—‘imaṃ okāsaṃ itthannāmassa ācikkhā’ti vutto tassa ācikkhati;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.47.1: Tena kho pana samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ āyasmato pilindavacchassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ corehi upaddutaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.47.3: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho te dārake iddhiyā ānetvā pāsāde ṭhapesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.47.8: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā pilindavaccho corehi nīte dārake ānessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.48.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū sahāyakā honti—paṇḍuko ca kapilo ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.48.3: Atha kho tassa bhikkhuno gāmakā kosambiṃ gacchantassa antarāmagge nadiṃ tarantassa sūkarikānaṃ hatthato muttā medavaṭṭi pāde laggā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.48.9: So—“pakatiyāpāhaṃ assamaṇo”ti tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:7.49.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāgalāyaṃ āyasmato daḷhikassa saddhivihāriko bhikkhu anabhiratiyā pīḷito āpaṇikassa veṭhanaṃ avaharitvā āyasmantaṃ daḷhikaṃ etadavoca—
